divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for the bus on midway and washington avenue in escondido and i noticed these objects in the distance and they were over by grand avenue...they looked like little round objects because they were so far away but then they started to hover and their lights started to blink...then they split into three groups and started rising into the atmosphere...i turned away concerned and I told my brother to look and we were both puzzled at what they were...we turned to get on the bus for a split second and we turned back and they were nowhere to be found...
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There were no other sightings in Escondido on or around June 23rd 2008
